home.tab_subtitle: You're running version {0} of Doki Doki Mod Manager.
home.section_resume_subtitle: Pick up where you left off with {0}.

about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a community-developed project that helps you find, install and play mods for Doki Doki Literature Club, a free Visual Novel game by Team Salvato.
about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a fan work of Doki Doki Literature Club and is not affiliated with Team Salvato. It is a fan work, as defined by Team Salvato's IP Guidelines.
about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager does not take responsibility for any damage caused to your files or computer, as a result of playing a mod or otherwise. It is up to you to ensure mods are safe to play.
about.description_support: Doki Doki Mod Manager will always be free to download and use. If you like it and want to help me keep it updated, consider supporting me in one of the following ways.
about.support_steelseries: Get 10% off SteelSeries gaming peripherals (affiliate link)
about.support_code: Contribute to the project (code or translations)

mods.tab_subtitle: Which mod do you want to play next?
mods.description_drop: Drag a mod here, or click to browse for mods.

install.description_installed: The game is fully installed and is ready to be played.
install.description_global_save: This installation of the game shares save data with standalone copies of DDLC, the Steam version of DDLC, and other installations with global save enabled.

mod.description_downloaded: The mod has been downloaded, but hasn't been installed into a copy of DDLC yet.

browse_dialog.title: Browse for a mod to install

sayonika.nyi_description: Integration with the Sayonika mod database is coming soon! While you wait, please download your mods from their respective authors.

settings.purist_description: Purist Mode disables Discord integration, achievements and several non-essential parts of the UI. Get to your mods faster.

launch.install_missing: The install could not be found.
launch.install_corrupt: The install is incomplete, corrupt or can't be read for some reason.
launch.install_crashed: The game failed to launch or crashed.

running.title: DDLC is running
running.description: Close the game to make changes to your mods.

install_modal.title: Install Game
install_modal.description_vanilla: You are installing a copy of DDLC without any mods.
install_modal.description_global_save: Enable global save to share this installation's save data with standalone and Steam versions of DDLC. This may cause issues with other mods.

uninstall_modal.title: Uninstall?
uninstall_modal.description_1: Are you sure you want to uninstall {0}? Your save data will be deleted.
uninstall_modal.description_2: If you want to reinstall a mod, you will need a copy of its zip file.

save_delete_modal.title: Delete save data?
save_delete_modal.description_1: Are you sure you want to delete the save data of {0}? Your progress will be lost.
save_delete_modal.description_2: The game will remain installed, but you will have to start over again.

exceptions.description_stacktrace: Detailed information about the error is listed below.

renderer_crash_notification.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager crashed
renderer_crash_notification.body: The problem has been reported. Please restart the app and try again.

renderer_freeze_notification.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager has stopped responding
renderer_freeze_notification.body: You may need to force quit the app if it doesn't respond soon.

main_crash_notification.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager crashed
main_crash_notification.body: The problem has been reported. Please restart and try again.

mod_install_notification.title: An error occurred while installing a mod
mod_install_notification.body: Please try downloading the mod again. If this is a recurring issue, let me know via the contact links on the About page. Please don't contact the mod developer.

game_install_notification.title: An error occurred while installing the game
game_install_notification.body: Please try again. If this is a recurring issue, try downloading DDLC again or let me know via the contact links on the About page.

install_delete_notification.title: An error occurred while uninstalling the game
install_delete_notification.body: Please refresh the mod list and try again. If this is a recurring issue, let me know via the contact links on the About page.

save_delete_notification.title: An error occurred while clearing your save data.
save_delete_notification.body: Please try again. If this is a recurring issue, let me know via the contact links on the About page.
